item.title: What to expect from Anthem as Bioware announce alpha test for shared world shooter - The Telegraph
item.description:
What to expect from Anthem as Bioware announce alpha test for shared world shooter  The Telegraph

It can be a shock to the system when a game developer deviates from the type of games it has built its name on. Bioware, so famed for its sprawling story-based single-player role-playing games, is doing just that with Anthem. Broadly billed as publisher EA's answer to Destiny, Anthem is a shared-world multiplayer shooter in which you play as a 'freelancer', a super-soldier packed into a Javelin exosuit, sent to complete missions and gather loot in its ornate sci-fi fantasy world.
